Overview:
Opterus Research and Development specializes in designing and manufacturing advanced structural systems for the aerospace industry. 

Our technologies include spaceflight and high-strain composite (HSC) booms, hinges, solar array structures, antennas, reflectors, and robotic architectures with integrated mechanisms. We provide comprehensive support to our customers throughout the product development life cycle, from conceptual design to flight operations, and we fulfill both high and low-volume production orders.

Since 2018, Opterus has launched and deployed over a dozen HSC-enabled structures with 100% operational success.

Join our highly collaborative team driving aerospace innovation.
